name: Swap Ball - Endless Arcade Bouncer
description:
Bounce from side to side! Just tap and hold to change the color of the ball. Score as many points as you can to unlock new characters!

How many times can you bounce?

FEATURES
• Simple One-Touch Controls
• Endless Gameplay
• 8 Different Balls to Unlock
• Minimal Design
• Colorful Themes
• Game Center Leaderboards
